appDesc.description: DoliCloud is the online service of Dolibarr ERP & CRM Open Source software in the Cloud for SME, freelance or foundations. Enable features you need (customers, prospects, suppliers, proposals, agenda, emailings, ...) and use a personalized solution to manage your business.
appDesc.message: The Open Source software for business. DoliCloud is a SaaS solution for Customer Relationshop Management (CRM)

appName.description: Online service of Dolibarr ERP & CRM in the Cloud (customers, prospects, suppliers, proposals, agenda, emailings).
